game_description: VR Pong is an immersive pong cup simulator using realistic physics that allows you to feel the satisfaction of sinking that last cup! - Explore unique and immersive environments - Select unique table skins & customize your cup color - Play against advanced AI to test your pong skills from Beginner to Expert levels - Enjoy upbeat playlists at every stage - Track your lifetime achievements and game statistics
review_1: literally cannot throw the ball without throwing my arm out. The ball doesn't even bounce on the table it goes right through it. The music is horrible and makes me want to put a car muffler right to my eardrums.
review_2: For a game in app labs this game feels and looks good. The music adds a nice atmosphere to some sweet locations. It took a couple minutes to find the sweet spot but I found it a lot better to follow through on the toss. Once I got that I took my opponent to town. I look forward to watching this game develop and enjoying it along the way.
review_3: Game play was realistic. Did not have issues previous reviewer had. Choice of environment/background gives you something interesting to look at when waiting for opponent to complete their turn. Easy to learn, even while drinking.
review_4: Don't go into the game thinking it's going to feel exactly like beer pong in real life, it takes some getting used to, but once you figure it out, it's second nature. Our friends all had a blast taking turns playing (can't wait for multiplayer!) Also love that you can change the difficulty and customize the background, cups, and table.
review_5: This is the worst game I’ve bought for Quest. Ping pong balls disappear in air before coming anywhere close to cups. Truly an unplayable game that wouldn’t be worth $1 but costs $10. Wish I was able to rate it zero stars. Extremely disappointing.
